bio: Bankless Academy is building a web3 education public good: featuring lessons/quests, community participation, collectible content & open-source infrastructure.
contributionDescription:
L2 blockchains are promising technology with inherent risks. It’s clear users need a basic web3 training program to guide & protect their first steps.

Bankless Academy provides a free learning journey following Bankless & Ethereum values. We are onboarding users to Optimism, to enjoy optimized transactions in an ecosystem valuing community ownership, public goods & self-sovereignty.

- Teaching essential web3 skills: wallet creation/security, dApp use, infrastructure theory, etc
- Hosting an Optimism onboarding journey: funding your wallet, using DEXs, governing/delegating on Optimism
- Building open-source education infrastructure: lessons w/ quests & NFT badges, sybil-resistance w/ Gitcoin Passport, multilingual content, community corrections, and hosting collectible content on Optimism
impactDescription:
Increasing participation in Optimism Collective governance:

- 240+ Explorers delegated in Optimism governance, through Optimism Governance lesson & delegation walkthrough

Improving Optimism end user experience & adoption:

- engaging format
- free-to-use
- teaching important basics required to navigate Optimism
- building web3 identity by distributing 11,100+ badges to Explorers (protected by Gitcoin Passport) for lesson completions
- 2370+ Explorers verified on Optimism, through ‘Layer 2s’ lesson and ‘How to Fund a Wallet on Layer 2’ walkthrough
- 150+ Velodrome Explorers swapped on Optimism, through ‘Decentralized Exchanges’ lesson and ‘How to Swap on a DEX’ walkthrough
- minted 145x Explorer’s Handbook (walkthroughs) NFTs on Optimism
- minted 19x lesson collectible NFTs on Optimism

pwCategorySuggestions: Web3 Education, Layer 2 Scaling, NFT Collectibles
